resources.string:
Hi, my name is Brendan 

I like baseball and video games. 
I've played baseball for the last 11 years, and played on the Thornhill Reds rep team for about 7. 
Recently I stepped down, however, because I wanted to focus on school. 

As for video games, I like to play lots of different types of games. 
I play Counter Strike and League of Legends at a decent level, but also enjoy 
singleplayer RPGs. My favourite is The Witcher 3, which I believe is one of the best games ever made. 

I study Nanotechnology Engineering at the University of Waterloo. It's the study of the development and fabrication on materials on the nanometer scale.
